name: Flinguin
description:
"You’ll enjoy catapulting them into the air, scoring points as you go. With four different targets to aim for this is a perfect, quick pick-up-and-play game." - AppAdvice.com

Who said penguins can't fly? You can make them fly - in Flinguin!  The delightfully enjoyable game where you join the baby penguins in their natural habitat, and catapult them through the air. Er…do take aim first, if you wanna get points! Enjoy four different variations in this addictive flight of the  penguins.

Whoosh! It's that simple and that much fun!

A big thanks to all users who wrote in asking for upgradation of this game. We apologise for the long delay in the release of this version that runs in fullscreen mode on the latest iPads and iPhones. New features have been added to improve the look and feel of the game, as well as simplifying gameplay. Stay tuned for new game modes in upcoming versions!
